body_html:
@yaroslavvb thank you, it seems like a sensible way to go.

I've tried prepending a export TF_CUDA_HOST_MEM_LIMIT_IN_MB=4096 to the command, but the problem persists.

I've compiled and installed google-perftools in $HOME, and prepended a export LD_PRELOAD="$HOME/lib/libtcmalloc.so.4" to the command, but the problem still persists.
